trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Granite City
There were no other sightings in Granite City on or around October 15th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in my chair that faces the front door to only look up and see a very strange silver object, it looked round and it was moving but by the time I jumped up to open the door and go outside it had disappeared in the blink of an eye.
